name: Yuna
description: President of the Reingar Student Council, the school girl from another world
story: President of the Reingar Student Council and the chosen Heir by the Guardian, Kazran. Yuna is a high school girl who was summoned into this world. She is full of curiosity and obsessed with technology, constantly running experiments.

relations.description: Although she will deny it, ever since he saved her from the Acolyte Tenebria, Yuna has had eyes only for Ras.
The student council's secretary, who tries to dump the presidency onto Yuna. Yuna wonders why she can't just be the president herself.

upgrade.description: The trustworthy clerk of the Reingar Student council, Hazel is a reliable ally of Yuna's.

relations.description: The trustworthy clerk of the Reingar Student council, Hazel is a reliable ally of Yuna's.
Yuna considers her a good person... But she's a little scary when she chases after Yuna and yells about her presidential duties.

upgrade.description: Karin is an indispensable person to Yuna, who always encourages her into finding strengths she didn't even know she had.

relations.description: Karin is an indispensable person to Yuna, who always encourages her into finding strengths she didn't even know she had.
Enemies when Yuna was running from her responsibilities, but they've helped each other since Yuna became student council president.
Enemies when Yuna was running from her responsibilities, but they've helped each other since Yuna became student council president.
Yuna sees the Acolyte Tenebria as an awful creature who sought to destroy the whole of Reingar as if it were a mere game.
Having been reunited with her childhood friend, Yuna wonders how she ended up in Reingar.
A childlike friend that Yuna can't help but want to dote on, even though he is older than he looks.
A knight Yuna met in Taranor. His heroic personality suits him well.

specialty.name: Lovely Machinery
specialty.description: She understands machinery well based on her strong affection towards it.

type.name: Barren Land
type.description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.

skills.name: Homing Laser
skills.description: Attacks all enemies with a drone before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 6% per target and all other allies by 2% per target. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.

ex_equip.name: Small Drone Tuna
ex_equip.description: Tuna is a drone made by Yuna. No matter where she goes, on Earth or on Orbis, Tuna is there to protect her.

skills.description: Combat Readiness increases by an additional 1% per target when using Homing Laser.
skills.skill_description: Attacks all enemies with a drone before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 7% per target and all other allies by 3% per target. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.

skills.description: Has a 30% chance each to grant allies increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns when using Upgrade.
skills.skill_description: Buffs all allies with a drone and increases Attack and Speed for 2 turns, with a 30% chance each to grant allies increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns.

skills.description: Damage dealt is increased by 30% when using Meteor Cannon.

skill1.name: ホーミングレーザー
skill1.desc: 敵全体に攻撃し、自身のアクションゲージを対象の数ｘ6%UPさせ、自身以外の味方全体のアクションゲージを対象の数ｘ2%UPさせる。自身のスピードが高いほどダメージがUPする。更に対象が3体以下の場合、対象が少ないほどダメージがUPする。

skill2.name: アップグレード
skill2.desc: 味方全体に攻撃力UPを2ターンの間付与する。

skill3.name: ミーティアキャノン
skill3.desc: 敵全体に攻撃する。命中時、クリティカルが発生する。対象が3体以下の場合、対象が少ないほどダメージがUPする。追加ターンが発生する。
